Name: Easy Charm
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Drifloon and Drifblim.  Swap a Drifbli-Gasp and a Drifbli-Card for a Easy Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
